subject: ProStyle 5000 digital display not working
body:
Hi there,

I got the ProStyle 5000 as a Christmas gift on December 25, 2025. The digital display stopped showing the temperature after just 2 weeks of use.

The dryer itself still works fine, but I can't see what temperature I'm using which defeats the purpose of the smart features.

Serial number: PS5K-2025-43210

I don't have the receipt since it was a gift, but my mom bought it from your official website.

Can you look up the order with the serial number?

Amanda Lee
234 River Road
Portland, OR 97201
503-555-0188

metadata.reason: Display defect covered, can verify via serial number
